fields.name: Text
fields.description: A single line text field accepts a single line of text for each cell. You can put any text value you want into each cell.

fields.name: Yes/No
fields.description: A checkbox field is useful for true/false values within a record. For example, a task tracking base might have a checkbox field called "Done" that you can check off when a task is complete.

fields.name: Selection
fields.description: A single select field is ideal when you want to be able to select a single option from a preset list of options.

fields.name: Date
fields.description: A date field allows you to easily enter a date and optionally a time into a cell.

fields.name: Time
fields.description: The duration field is a field type intended for use with time durations measured in minutes, seconds, or milliseconds.

fields.name: Numeric
fields.description: A number field will only accept a number value. You can customize the formatting of your number field to display integers or decimals.

fields.name: Radio
fields.description: A radio field is useful for true/false values within a record. For example, a task tracking base might have a radio field called "Done" that you can check off when a task is complete.

fields.name: Url
fields.description: A URL field is intended to store a single URL in each cell. Clicking on a URL will bring you to that URL.

fields.name: Attachment
fields.description: An attachment field allows you to attach multiple files directly to your records. If the file is an image, the cell will show thumbnails of the files you've attached.

fields.name: Lookup
fields.description: A lookup field allows you to look up a specific field in a linked record.

fields.name: Creation date
fields.description: The created time field type will automatically show the date (and optionally, time) that a record was created.

fields.name: Last modified
fields.description: The last modified time field type will automatically return the most recent date (and optionally, time) that a record was modified by a user in a non-computed field.

fields.name: Label
fields.description: The label type allows you to create labels wherever you want.

fields.name: Button
fields.description: Button type allows you to create buttons as you like.
